description: Situated in the heart of Levanto just a stone’s throw from the sea, this trattoria serving traditional fish and seafood (as well as a few meat options) has been run by the same owners for almost 20 years. Friendly ambience, good service, plus a few tables in a small outdoor space which need to be booked well in advance.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Diners Club credit card', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
